lead_paragraph: Cleveland Indians outfielder Marlon Byrd was suspended for 162 games by Major League Baseball on Wednesday after he tested positive for a banned substance a second time.

headline.print_headline: Indians Byrd Hit With 162 Game Drug Suspension
headline.main: Indians Byrd Hit With 162 Game Drug Suspension
